title: [Notice] Temporal Lock on DRACO Smeltery
author: MIR4
contents:
[img]{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40990380/56406e276d84aa6faa770559c292d7f3bdd88945.png[/img]

[b]From my battle to our war, MMORPG MIR4[/b]

Greetings, This is MIR4.

We are currently blocking the Smelting features in DRACO to improve the stability of gameplay.

â–  Details
- XDRACO > DRACO > Temporal Restriction on DRACO Smelting
- Smelting in MIRAGE will also be restricted.

We will announce you further through this notice when being fixed.

We appreciate your understanding and patience, and will always try to provide a stable game service.

Thank you.
